update t_offer_summary
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_TYPE = #{feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_REF_ID = #{feeRefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFER_SOURCE = #{offerSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE_MODE = #{chargeMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFER_AMOUNT = #{offerAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
OFFER_TIME = #{offerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHARGE_STATUS = #{chargeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFER_BATCH_NO = #{offerBatchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPLIT_CNT = #{splitCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RET_CNT = #{retCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RESERVER1 = #{reserver1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVER2 = #{reserver2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVER3 = #{reserver3,jdbcType=DATE},
RESERVER4 = #{reserver4,jdbcType=DATE},
RESERVER5 = #{reserver5,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
RESERVER6 = #{reserver6,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
